Class ConversionServiceExposingInterceptorConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.modules.web.config.support.PrefixingHandlerMappingConfigurerAdapter
      • com.foreach.across.modules.web.config.ConversionServiceExposingInterceptorConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PrefixingHandlerMappingConfigurer

    @Configuration
public class ConversionServiceExposingInterceptorConfiguration
extends PrefixingHandlerMappingConfigurerAdapter
    Exposes the ConversionService to all mappers by default.
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme
